name: resolveContent(for:with:)
desc: Resolves the content to append to the note.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.
declaration:
optional func resolveContent(for intent: INAppendToNoteIntent, 
                        with completion: @escaping (INNoteContentResolutionResult) -> Void)
